definition: one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
erhua variant of 一塊|一块[yi1 kuai4]

sentences.english: One of our windowpanes is cracked .
sentences.chinese: 我们的窗玻璃裂了一块。

sentences.english: Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, something.
sentences.chinese: 真相？一块石英？只一次，便成永远。

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake . The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 厨子烤了一块饼，烤饼的时间太长了，硬得像石头。

sentences.english: I need to buy a watch with a second hand.
sentences.chinese: 我要买一块有秒针的表。

sentences.english: Boys and girls go out together from an early age.
sentences.chinese: 美国的男孩和女孩从小就可以一块出去玩。

sentences.english: You're incrementing this chunk of memory.
And she had a dictation with me this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她和我一块听写了那些内容。

sentences.english: He egged her on  to throw a stone through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他怂恿她扔一块石头打破窗户。

sentences.english: B. C. C. I. became a magnet for drug money.
sentences.chinese: 国际信贷银行像一块大磁铁，吸引贩毒的钱。

sentences.english: The result is a universe that now looks like a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 结果是如今的宇宙看上去就像一块海绵。
来一块鱼肉三明治怎么样？

sentences.english: He ate a bar of candy and then asked for another.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了一块糖，然后又要了一块。

sentences.english: He ate a bar of candy and then asked for another.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了一块糖，然后又要了一块。

sentences.english: PUGILISTS and aesthetes are not necessarily in opposing corners.
sentences.chinese: 拳击家和美学家未必就凑不到一块儿。

sentences.english: Why not serve a piece of each?
sentences.chinese: 何不两条鱼各上一块呢？

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake. The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 厨子烤了一块饼，饼烤的时间太长，硬得像石头。

between/intermediate/mid/middle
